attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the past few years university funds have increased hugely from £1000 a year to £3000, due to this figure more and more students have been unable to continue their higher education because of the high fees. I am requesting cheaper student fees so more students can further their education to their desire.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
